Row.Text: I am, by all known laws of this land, ruler of Tonga, King Siaosi Tupou I. I beg of you, make valuable use of my time.
Hello there. Welcome to the islands of Tonga. I am King Siaosi Tupou I, defender of the isles and unifier of the kingdoms.
I could not protect these islands. I pray that you find success where I have not. Please, just let me have one last swim in these waters.
